m:StandardListItem.title: To adapt the copied integration flow to your needs, click the 'Edit view' symbol in the left upper corner.
To find your copied integration flow, enter in the 'Filter' text field in the right upper area: 'ERP to SuccessFactors Employee Central Cost Center'.
To navigate to your iFlow, click on 'ERP to SuccessFactors Employee Central Cost Center'.
To get to the configurable parts of the package, click 'ARTIFACTS' tab.
On the right side, click the arrow symbol to get the context menu opened.
Select 'Configure' from the menu to get a window opened, where you can specify the parameters for the configuration.
Click the 'Sender' tab. The Sender in this scenario is the S/4HANA system.
